title: Emerald & Diamond Chandbali Jhumkas - A Timeless Telugu Classic
materials: 22K Gold Plated. High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
and Cultured Pearls. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced shine and durability.
features: Intricately designed Chandbali style earrings with a cascading Jhumka. The central Emerald is meticulously set amidst a dazzling array of CZ stones. Features a delicate filigree design and elegant pearl drops. The top portion of the earrings features a floral design, which is a recurring theme in South Indian jewelry. The earrings are lightweight and comfortable to wear.
colors: and Pearl White. A classic South Indian color palette that exudes elegance.
occasions: or any festive occasion. Also suitable for special occasions such as Diwali
description: These earrings blend traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. The radiant Emeralds and sparkling CZ stones create a captivating look that will turn heads. A symbol of grace and sophistication, these Chandbalis are a valuable addition to any jewelry collection and a cherished keepsake for generations to come.
